title: Champion quotes you cannot say to your significant other
body: {{champion:83}} "Tired, ancient, and half-dead. Still, I come for you."

Kayn: "Another target ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Kayn: "They're next. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Kayn: "Shadows cut deep as fear! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Found you! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Fear the darkened blade! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "You have my undivided attention ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Drive me into their flesh! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "From the shadow comes the slaughter. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Time to reap. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Again! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Yes! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Again! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Yes! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Found you! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "The bigger they are... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "The louder they scream. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) "
Kayn: "Such a waste of time. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "This will only dull the blade. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Sure, why not. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Well... we are here... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "I have chosen you, you will serve me. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Kayn: "(Laughs) Their screams will echo in this place ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Stain this fetid swamp with their blood. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Oh yeah... Let's turn this river red. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "The strong fall so quickly to my blade ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Even Zed would be impressed. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Ooohhh, that felt gooood. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Stand back! Kayn doesn't know how deadly this thing gets! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "You wanted mercy? Not from me! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Thats one to remember! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Here we go! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Oh. I do like this ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Yes.. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Yes.. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Rhaast: "Come here! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Nothing personal, brother. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Rhaast: "Wah ha ha ha ha ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Rhaast: "Wah ha ha ha ha ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Rhaast: "Yeees.. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Kayn: "I'm here! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "I am everywhere.. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "This will be quick! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"
Kayn: "Silence, then pain. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

Kayn: "Hah ha ha ha ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)"

I'm not very good at this.

{{champion:44}} 

Let's see how hot things get.  Why is it always the ugly ones?  Memories of Demacia.  Just like the old days.  Are you even wearing pants?  Shine on you crazy diamond.  Let me show you something.  Say hello to my little gems.  These gems aren't just for show.  It's okay if you're impressed, the protector was too.  Nowhere left to go but up.  Just in case.  You can always use a little extra protection.  Better safe than sorry.  Crash the mountain upon them.  For Targon!  Smooth.  Fits well.  Shake the pillars of heaven.  Gems hurt, don't they?  Never submit.  Vigor.  Well that was refreshing.  Money well spent.  Wish I'd had this on the mountain.
